title: Fix DevlogList footer positioning and selection button layout
description:
Fix two layout issues in the DevlogList component:
1. The table footer is not fixed to the bottom of the viewport - it scrolls with content
2. The selection action buttons (Update, Add Note, Delete) are positioned in the center, but should be aligned with the selection count on the left side

These issues affect the user experience and table usability, especially when dealing with large lists or batch operations.

notes.content: Completed: Successfully fixed both DevlogList footer positioning and selection button layout issues. The table footer now uses sticky positioning for better integration with Ant Design's table layout, and the selection action buttons (Update, Add Note, Delete) are properly aligned with the selection count on the left side. Both issues have been resolved while maintaining all existing functionality and responsive design.

context.technicalContext: The DevlogList component uses a CSS Grid layout for the footer with three columns (left, center, right). The footer needs to be positioned at the bottom of the container, and the selection actions need to be moved from center to left alongside the selection count.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer stays fixed at bottom of table container
Selection count and action buttons appear together on the left side
Layout remains responsive on mobile devices
No visual regressions in table functionality
